task.prompt: On Monday Elisa paints 30 square feet of her house's walls. On Tuesday she paints twice that amount. On Wednesday she finishes up by painting half as many square feet as she painted on Monday. How many square feet total does Elisa paint in her house?

steps.c: Plan: identify requirements from task. Task: On Monday Elisa paints 30 square feet of her house's walls. On Tuesday she paints twice that amount. On Wednesday she finishes up by painting half as many square feet as she painted on Monday. How many square feet total does Elisa paint in her house?
